phrases: Do not you have anything to say about my winter uniform?
What do you want so early in the day?
I thought I would walk to school with you.
You tend to stand out, so I would rather not.
I told the girls about work yesterday.
When is the movie coming out?!
It is a load off my shoulders.
The midterms will begin next week.
any scores below thirty will be deemed failing grades, as always.
Be sure to revise, and revise well.
The Quint es sen tial Quin tup let us
Wow, you are studying during a break.
I hear you are studying at home, too.
I can tell because we are classmates.
You are the most studious of the quints.
It is just that you are stupid!
I am sure even you could improve your grades.
There is definitely a limit to what I can do alone.
Could you help me with this question?
Come to the staff room later.
Are you ready for the midterms?
Hey, was not that guy calling you?
You were happy to go along with it back at the festival, were not you?
We can do it at your place if we have to.
Just give me one more chance!
There is so much I can teach you, Nino!
I swear I will satisfy you!
You are going to give people the wrong idea!
What is different about me today?
I am assuming you have heard that the midterms are coming up.
Hint: it is somewhere above my neck.
Unless you do better, there is no way you are going to survive the exams.
The answer is that my ribbon has a different pattern than usual.
I heard checks are in right now.
Your answer sheets are full of checks, too.
You are not one to be laughing.
At least Yotsuba is willing to work at it.
We have a week until midterms.
We are going to prepare thoroughly for them!
And Miku, you need to work not only on Japanese history...
Miku's studying English, her worst subject, and without being forced to!
I just felt like trying for once.
All right, everyone, let us do this!
I cannot wait to get home.
Damn it, after school is not enough time.
How much can we cram in during the weekend?
We do not need to work that hard, do we?
It is not like we are going to wind up getting expelled over a midterm.
We are going to do our best.
I mean, if you are going to give us a reward, we will try harder.
I would like that fruit parfait by the station.
I am starting to want some, too.
Let us invite the others and go right now.
I thought you could not wait to get home.
Maybe I do not need to freak out too much.
Hurry up, or we will leave you behind!
I cannot believe you would go home in that situation.
You were supposed to go with them!
No, I need to go home and study.
You chased me down just to tell me that?
I was asked to get you on the phone.
I will put him on now.
Thanks for taking care of my daughters.
Nice to finally speak to you.
You have no reason to call me father.
You have no reason to call him father.
I am sorry I have not been able to show up at all.
I trust that the tutoring has been going well.
Of course, we are in the middle of it right now.
I will tell you the answer to that later.
I am sure they will be fine if they keep it up.
I have heard the midterms are coming up.
I am glad you are making good progress.
but I would like you to show me results.
If any of the five fail their upcoming midterms,
I will have you tender your resignation as their tutor.
I wish you all the best.
Is not it a bit too early to decide?!
And that was enough to make you sweat buckets?
Why do not you stop worrying about me and start worrying about yourself?
I hope you are preparing for the midterms.
You did badly on that quiz today, did not you?
She would be pissed off if I said that.
I am sure she is doing her best.
Let me know if there is anything you need help with.
I told you I do not need your help.
You work hard, but you are slow.
and I will teach you well.
Learn from Ichika and Miku a little!
but I did ask you to help me at first.
You were the one who turned me down.
I do not need your half-hearted help.
So you think you can pass without any help?
I can, even if it is too late for these midterms.
If you fail these midterms, it is over!
You are the one being fussy.
Do not you want better grades?
So just shut up and listen to me!
I was starting to respect you a little.
It looks like I should not have.
So you are just doing it for the money.
Who would care about a stubborn brat like you if it was not for work?
You do not need to force yourself to teach me.
I do not exist to make money for you.
Do not blame me if you regret it.
Even if it means getting expelled,
I am never having you teach me!
You are fired, and now you are unemployed.
My neck is on the line.
This is no time to be getting in a fight.
Maybe I should just be honest.
Even in a game, I am poor...
We do not have time for this!
Let us get back to work.
But we studied a lot today.
It is not good to overdo it.
You seem more desperate than usual.
Are we really that far behind?
Hey, you are not even studying.
Jeez, you have almost no money.
Just imagine what would happen if she found out.
It is so obvious what she would try to do.
You are done tutoring for the day, are not you?
This is going to get us nowhere.
That is not what you promised.
You said you were going to stay overnight to help us study.
Why did Ichika help me out like that, though?
Anyway, I am starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel.
Ichika said there is something you wanted to tell me.
What is it that you wanted to tell me?
If any of you get a failing grade,
I am going to be forced to quit tutoring you.
So that is what it was.
Why would you open the door?!
You have seen me naked before.
I have been wondering why you and Itsuki have been acting weird.
You are fired if we fail, huh?
Uesugi-san's been in the bath for a while.
I am sure he is savoring the water that five beautiful girls bathed in.
You might as well make a move on him while he is here.
I do not know what you are talking about.
Shall we start studying for the exams?
Wh-Why do not you join us, Nino?
Nino would love it if someone failed and I got fired.
She is never going to try to study.
If anything, she will do everything in her power not to study.
Miku says she needs help with something, too.
What is a synonym for argument?
Remember it like de ba te.
That one's going to be on the exam for sure.
What kind of girls do you like?
I will teach you, then, if you really want to know.
The top three qualities I look for in a girl.
But I am only revealing one for every page you fill.
Good thing they are so easy to manipulate.
You are talking about your sister!
You should stop listening in and join us.
I can hear you, even if I do not want to.
I told you my stance on the matter.
I am not interested in dating.
You have to praise people when they do well, Futaro-kun.
I thought a study group would be quieter.
It is hard to apologize when I am actually facing her.
Miku, may I borrow your headphones?
I want to focus by myself.
I do not want to hold you back.
Look, Futaro-kun, the stars are pretty.
Did you get in a fight with Itsuki-chan or something?
It is the same thing as always.
You and Itsuki-chan end up fighting every time you see each other.
I want you two to fight like friends, like you usually do.
I think she is just being stubborn.
Are not you the same way?
I think she is just having a hard time being upfront.
I am sure she is hurting on her own right now.
I will do what I can,
but there are some things that only you can do,
so I am counting on you.
You five were born at nearly the same time,
so I thought it did not matter in your case...
But you actually are the oldest sister.
What is up with the hand?
You were the one who told me to do that.
Okay, you can use my bed.
So this is what they call a bed.
Next Time on The Quintessential Quintuplets
Itsuki-chan's the biggest eater of the five of us.
All I have had today is a bowl of katsudon!
It is only eight in the morning, though.
